Package org.example.GUI.ui

Class UrmButton

java.lang.Object
org.example.GUI.ui.PauseButton
org.example.GUI.ui.UrmButton
public class UrmButton extends PauseButton
Represents a button used for Urm in the GUI. Extends the PauseButton class.

  • Constructor Details

    • UrmButton

      public UrmButton(int x, int y, int width, int height, int rowIndex)
      Constructs a UrmButton object with specified coordinates, dimensions, and row index.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the button.
      y - The y-coordinate of the button.
      width - The width of the button.
      height - The height of the button.
      rowIndex - The row index for determining the image in the sprite atlas.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the state of the Urm button based on user interaction.

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics g)
      Draws the Urm button.
      Parameters:
      g - The Graphics object for rendering.

    • resetBools

      public void resetBools()
      Resets the boolean flags tracking mouse interaction with the button.

    • isMouseOver

      public boolean isMouseOver()
      Checks if the mouse is currently over the button.
      Returns:
      true if the mouse is over the button, otherwise false.

    • setMouseOver

      public void setMouseOver(boolean mouseOver)
      Sets the flag indicating whether the mouse is over the button.
      Parameters:
      mouseOver - true to indicate the mouse is over the button, otherwise false.

    • isMousePressed

      public boolean isMousePressed()
      Checks if the button is currently being pressed.
      Returns:
      true if the button is being pressed, otherwise false.

    • setMousePressed

      public void setMousePressed(boolean mousePressed)
      Sets the flag indicating whether the button is being pressed.
      Parameters:
      mousePressed - true to indicate the button is being pressed, otherwise false.
